title: A RECENT DEATH IN AN ANCIENT TEMPLE
description: The Investigation Institute had been funding the excavation of an ancient temple, but while they were working on the project, one of the archeologists was killedâ€” was it by ancient magick? They insisted Inspector Irratino accompany Logico, to make sure that magick got a fair shake.

suspects.name: INSPECTOR IRRANTINO
suspects.description: An esoteric detective. While Logico believes only what he can prove, Irratino believes only what he can't.

suspects.name: BISHOP AZURE
suspects.description: A bishop in a local church, Azure has been known to pray for both her friends and her enemies. Of course, she asks for different things...

suspects.name: CHANCELLOR TUSCANY
suspects.description: As the head of Deduction College, she has deduced the best way to get the most money from alumni. (Blackmail.)

weapons.name: A CRYSTAL SKULL
weapons.description: Made entirely of crystal. Maybe an ancient alien skull or maybe just a fun art project.

weapons.name: A SKELETON ARM
weapons.description: Cause the death of a person with the bones of a person who's dead.

weapons.name: A RITUAL DAGGER
weapons.description: It's made out of some ancient metal that Logico can't identify.

locations.name: THE GRAND ENTRANCE
locations.description: Thanks to the ravages of time, now more of a crumbling entrance.

locations.name: THE SACRED CHAMBER
locations.description: Who knows what happened in here behind these heavy iron doors?

locations.name: THE HIGH ALTAR
locations.description: A massive stone altar draped in rotting fabric.

clues: Chancellor Tuscany did not trust the person who had the crystal skull.
Logico discovered a splintered piece of bone outdoors, using the principle of rationality. (He tripped over it.)

statements.speaker: Inspector Irratino
statements.statement: A ritual dagger was at the high altar.

statements.speaker: Chancellor Tuscany
statements.statement: Bishop Azure was not in the sacred chamber.
